alert.note: Alert for Baylor; Foard; Hardeman; Wichita; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 11:17PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Jackson, southwestern Tillman, northwestern Archer, southwestern Wichita, east central Foard, Wilbarger, northern Baylor and southeastern Hardeman Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1117 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chillicothe to 4 miles southeast of Lockett to 4 miles west of Lake Kemp. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Electra, Chillicothe, Davidson, Lake Diversion, Harrold, Lockett, Fargo, Medicine Mound, Odell, Oklaunion, Grayback, Lake Kemp, Haynesville, and Rayland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
